description:
These high comfort cargo shorts are constructed using breathable, stretchy Flexile™ fabric and built for long days on the trail. The ride-ready features include a low-profile, ventilated chamois and two easy-access stash pockets.

Crafted for enduring comfort over long distances and multi-day epics, the Cinder Cargo Shorts are built with high stretch Flexile™ fabric to contour to your body and keep you pedalling. We selected the Elastic Interface® Gravel Performance men’s-specific chamois specially for its ability to ease pressure on sensitive areas, provide low-profile cushioning, and allow ventilation when the gradient starts to rise.

The shorts feature multiple details to enhance your comfort including a high stretch waistband with elastic edging, and a seamless inner thigh to reduce soreness caused by wear points. Side and seat reinforcements make the shorts extra durable so they can go the distance. The bike-ready fit includes a raised centre back and silicone grips on the lower hems, to keep the shorts in place on any trail.

Keep extra baggage to a minimum by stashing your essentials in the two mesh thigh pockets, within easy reach when you’re on the move. The Cinder Cargo Shorts are finished with a fluorocarbon-free DWR and offer you versatility and comfort on every ride.
name: Rab Cinder Cargo Shorts - Mens
